content: round at http //www youtube com/watch v=14ywbngfohm body with brown yarn co 36 sts onto 3 dpns 12 on each and work the following rounds 1-2 k all sts 3 m1 k6 repeat to end 4-5 k all sts 6 m1 k7 repeat to end 7-8 k all sts 9 m1 k8 repeat to end 10-11 k all sts 12 m1 k9 repeat to end 13-14 k all sts 15 m1 k10 repeat to end 16-17 k all sts 18 m1 k11 repeat to end 19-23 k all sts 24 k2tog k10 repeat to end 25-26 k all sts 27 k2tog k9 repeat to end 28-29 k all sts 30 k2tog k8 repeat to end 31-32 k all sts 33 k2tog k7 repeat to end 34-35 k all sts 36 k2tog k6 repeat to end 37-38 k all sts 39 k2tog k5 repeat to end 40-41 k all sts 42 k2tog k4 repeat to end 43-44 k all sts ~ 2 ~ measure off about 3 yards of yarn 5 yards for the white goose cut and stuff inside for working the end of the goose later thread a darning needle with a piece of scrap yarn and slip all of the remaining live sts onto it removing the dpns as you go breast stitches are now picked up in the original cast on sts to shape the goose s breast using white yarn and beginning just to the right of the first co st pu 1 st for every co st there should be 36 sts total 12 on each dpn 1 k all sts short row are now worked back and forth across the 1st and 3rd dpns to shape the rounded breast 2 needle 1 k1 wt p1 needle 3 p1 wt k1 3 needle 1 k2 wt p2 needle 3 p2 wt k2 4 needle 1 k3 wt p3 needle 3 p3 wt k3 continue in this manner increasing the number of stitches to knit/purl by one on each short row until all of the sts on needles 1 and 3 except the first one on each dpn have been wrapped then work the following rounds on all three dpns 1 k all sts 2 k2 k2tog repeat to end 3-4 k all sts 5 k1 k2tog repeat to end 6-7 k all sts 18 neck head and bill switch to black yarn and k all sts for three inches without cutting the black yarn add white yarn and k all sts for 4 rounds work one round in black short row are now worked to shape the goose s head knit all sts on needle 1 then work the short row according to the instructions below beginning at the juncture between the 1st and 2nd dpns 1 needle 2 k1 wt p1 needle 1 p1 wt k1 2 needle 2 k2 wt p2 needle 1 p2 wt k2 3 needle 2 k3 wt k3 needle 1 p3 wt k3 ~ 3 ~ continue in this
